traits.name: Labyrinthine Recall
traits.desc: The minotaur can perfectly recall any path it has traveled.

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc: The shaman is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). The shaman has the following cleric spells prepared: * 1st level (4 slots): bane, faerie fire * 2nd level (3 slots): barkskin, enhance ability, silence * 3rd Level (2 slots): bestow curse, spirit guardians
